channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ripple announces launch of RLUSD stablecoin
item.description: RLUSD will be available on Uphold, Bitso, MoonPay, Archax, and CoinMENA.

item.title: Cruise lines are seeing their biggest passenger surges since the pandemic
item.description: Stock prices for one operator are soaring as well.

item.title: The bubble in U.S. inflation is likely to burst soon. Here’s why.
How Musk’s enormous bet on Trump could drive 50% share-price gain for Tesla
The trillion-dollar-market-cap Broadcom is having its Nvidia moment
These are the holiday shipping deadlines you need to know for your presents to arrive on time
item.description: They’re even closer than you feared.

item.title: Elite runner and Peloton instructor Becs Gentry ran 7 marathons in 7 days across 7 continents. How she prepared for the grueling $50,000 challenge
item.description: “In the weirdest way, being the toughest, most stressful thing on my body, it’s brought me such peace and relaxation."

item.title: The stock market is up 27% ahead of next Fed meeting. Is a correction overdue?
Bitcoin hits another record high. Can it reach $150,000 this cycle?
As car dealers trash his legacy, ousted Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares says he wouldn’t act differently
item.description: Carlos Tavares has no regreats about his premature exit from troubled automaker Stellantis.
